name: Godwill Ocheme
summary: Experienced and detailed IT specialist with 6+ years working as a Linux Administrator, DevOps and Cloud operations. Proficient in CI/CD pipelines, AWS, Terraform, Kubernetes, Jenkins, and more.

responsibilities: Engineered and implemented a shell script for automated user account management across servers.
Enhanced system access and security through automation of user creation, deletion, password expiration, and SSH setup.
Designed and developed robust solutions for software development and testing.
Managed IAM integration with Okta and Active Directory.
Integrated Cloudtamer and established AWS roles for GovCloud accounts.
Developed Kubernetes cluster architecture for high availability and security.
Implemented CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins, Docker, and Kubernetes.
Migrated legacy applications to Kubernetes using Helm.
Enhanced Terraform scripts for dynamic subnet generation across AWS availability zones.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Biological and Physical Sciences

education.certificate: Certificate in Computer Operations and Control (Information Technology)
education.institution: Sacred Heart Computer Vocational Institute, Lagos
